Cecil Van Vlielt

  1. Foster Name: Cecil
  2. Foster Family: Henry and Theresa Wortman
  3. Location of Family: Bow Valley, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Hartington, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 2
  7. Date of Birth: 7/10/1910, Brooklyn, NY
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: Charlotte Endort; 1920 United States Federal Census; Living Here, Winter 2007; Letter in V's; Hartington Herald, 4 October 1912.
